item.title: 'I'm 50 with 10pc of my money in gold, how should I invest?'
item.author: The Daily Telegraph
item.description: Victoria Scholar Dear Victoria Scholar Q Could you please give me your thoughts and opinion on my exchange-traded fund (ETF) portfolio. It is for the long term as I am 50 years of age and I am intending to stay invested until my retirement age of 67 or 68. I know my bond allocation is quite low but ...
